From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Spasstik begins bounding away from the battlefield, holding Megatron
carefully in his jaw.

Frenzy arrives at the docked base holding onto Soundwave. (rAuq,
whenever you want him, take him). Soundwave leaps into the air
unfolding, and transforming into his large robot mode. He presses a
button on his chest, opening a link to Astrotrain. "Astrotrain, pick up
Spasstik from Africa, then bring Abominus and the ship." He walks into
the ship followed by Frenzy, until he reaches Switchblade's lab.

Frenzy folds his arms with a smug look on his face. "Long time no see,
Switchblade." he finishes with a small hint of disdain in his voice.
